软件包 com.android.rhtunning

This package is used to get the audio input from microphone, calculate the frequency of it, and then shows it in the screen in realtime.

请参见：
          描述

类摘要
TunningActivity A TunningActivity object represents the main activity of the Erhu Tunning activity.
 

软件包 com.android.rhtunning 的描述

This package is used to get the audio input from microphone, calculate the frequency of it, and then shows it in the screen in realtime.
